More common&mdash;Dupuytren's contractur: Blistering, burning, coldness, discoloration of the skin, feeling of pressure, hives, infection, inflammation, lumps, numbness, rash, scarring, stinging, tingling, or ulceration at the injection site
flushing, redness of the skin or unusually warm skin at the injection site
itching, pain, swelling, or tenderness at the injection site
swollen, painful, or tender lymph glands in the neck or armpit
